pageProps.title: Create roadmaps to stay on track

children.value:
The internet is a place full of information.
In fact, too full.
You could consume endless information from one resource to another and create stagnation because you're adapting too many ideas at a time.
Time spent on learning a skill should equally spend time for applying said skill

.
It could further your hoarding tendencies and maybe just start collecting knowledge as
Collecting information only feels like progress

Having a roadmap helps you to stay on track whether you're studying for a job, creating a new project, or learning a new hobby.
This roadmap could be just a simple to-do list, an elaborate plan, or a one-line description of the output you expect

backlinks.title: Create an inbox to store your thoughts
Learning a new skill often starts from specific places
Make a hub note to connect ideas together
Diving head-first into a difficult problem makes a bad start
When starting out, focus on quantity over quality
